text:
Swara Bhasker Slams Trolls, Battle Of Winterfell Isn’t The Last One & More From Entertainment!
Swara Bhasker Slams Trolls, Battle Of Winterfell Isn’t The Last One & More From Entertainment!
#1 The Battle Of Winterfell Wasn’t The Last One! An Epic Fight In Game Of Thrones Is Yet To Begin
You didn’t think the Battle of Winterfell was the end, did you?
2. Swara Bhasker Gives A Classy Reply To Trolls Who Slut-Shamed Her For The Masturbation Scene!
And yet again, today, when Mumbaikers stepped out to vote in the fourth phase of Lok Sabha elections, some people had placards in their hands that said, “Use your fingers wisely.”
3. From Anil Ambani, Priyanka Chopra To Madhuri Dixit, Influential People Step Out To Cast Their Vote
Mumbai, the city of dreams and also the city of billionaires, is home to Bollywood stars as well as seven of the India’s 19 richest people including Mukesh Ambani and Uday Kotak. From celebs like Anil Ambani to Priyanka Chopra, Madhuri Dixit, Aamir Khan and Sanajay Dutt, a lot of celebs were seen at polling booths to cast their vote.
4. 9 Instances That Prove The Frenzy For ‘Avengers: Endgame’ Was Too Much For Cinemas To Handle!
Don't Miss 159 SHARES 842 SHARES
A 32-year-old woman in Bengaluru got stitches due to rush at one of the theatres. While she was entering the cinema hall, people were in so much hurry to go to their seats, that she was pulled and she fell flat on her face and got stitches.
5. Bow Down To The ‘Real Queen’! Fans Declare Arya Stark As The Ultimate Hero Of Game Of Thrones
Arya and Bran right after THAT scene...#GameOfThrones pic.twitter.com/VrUN0RmU1X — Kenneth Bone (@warhog123) April 29, 2019
OKAY! So, without further ado, the scene in particular that left all the people across the world watching the epic Battle of Winterfell today stunned was Arya Stark killing the Night King. Yes, the epic and most dangerous villain in the history of television is dead and it is the young Stark girl who made him meet his end.
title: Swara Bhasker Slams Trolls, Battle Of Winterfell Isn’t The Last One & More From Entertainment!
description: From Swara Bhasker clapping back at the trolls for slut-shaming her over her masturbation scene to Game of Thrones’ Battle of Winterfell and the sneak peak into upcoming epic battle, here is all that rocked the world of entertainment today. You know the drill, right? If you haven’t watched Game of Thrones episode 3 as of yet, there are spoilers in the article below. Scroll down at your own risk.
